body:
Comment 14: 
I think I have the gold linker. One of my previous comments shows the configure line. 

gccgo -flto bork.go -Wl,--version says:

collect2 version 4.6.0 20110216 (experimental) (x86-64 Linux/ELF)
/opt/gold/bin/ld -plugin
/usr/local/libexec/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.6.0/liblto_plugin.so
-plugin-opt=/usr/local/libexec/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.6.0/lto-wrapper
-plugin-opt=-fresolution=/tmp/cc8EIio4.res -plugin-opt=-pass-through=-lgcc_s
-plugin-opt=-pass-through=-lgcc -plugin-opt=-pass-through=-lc
-plugin-opt=-pass-through=-lgcc_s -plugin-opt=-pass-through=-lgcc --build-id
--eh-frame-hdr -m elf_x86_64 -dynamic-linker /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2
/usr/lib/../lib64/crt1.o /usr/lib/../lib64/crti.o
/usr/local/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.6.0/crtbegin.o
-L/usr/local/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.6.0
-L/usr/local/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.6.0/../../../../lib64 -L/lib/../lib64
-L/usr/lib/../lib64 -L/usr/local/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.6.0/../../..
/tmp/cc8sndWr.o --version -lgobegin -lgo -lm --wrap=pthread_create -lgcc_s -lgcc -lc
-lgcc_s -lgcc /usr/local/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.6.0/crtend.o
/usr/lib/../lib64/crtn.o

the GNU General Public License version 3 or (at your option) a later version.
This program has absolutely no warranty.
